title: 日本淺草觀音寺一百籤第六十二籤
poem: 災轗時時退,名顯四方揚,改故重乘祿,昴高福自昌

analysis.zh: 這首詩的主題是：隨著時間推移，災難會慢慢退散，名聲將廣為人知，舊有的錯誤將被修正並換得更高的官位，最後在星光之下，福氣將自然而然地蓬勃發展。
analysis.en: 這首詩的主題是：With time, calamities fade, reputation spreads far and wide, past mistakes are corrected and one attains higher rank, and ultimately, under the shining stars, fortune flourishes naturally.
analysis.jp: この詩のテーマは：時間が経つにつれ、災難は徐々に退き、名声は四方へ広がり、過去の過ちが修正されてより高い位を得る。そして星の光の下で、幸福が自然に繁栄することである。

rag_analysis:
According to the poem, the core meaning is:
- Calamities (災轗) recede gradually over time, suggesting an improvement in fortune.
- Renown (名顯) spreads in all directions, indicating rising reputation or influence.
- Past errors are corrected and one gains higher office or merit (改故重乘祿), hinting at personal growth and advancement.
- The imagery of the rising star (昴) and flourishing fortune (福自昌) portrays a future of sustained prosperity.
Overall, the verse conveys a positive trajectory from adversity to success, emphasizing that persistent effort and learning from mistakes lead to lasting good fortune.
